name: Nanoblitz - 1.1
description:
NANOBLITZ 001 - ABOUT NANOBLITZ is a high octane cyberpunk shoot em' up fending off government drones as an escaped android made for the 2020.1 Brackeys Game Jam.  Fight through rounds of drones sacrificing health (Nanobots) in order to unlock and use abilities necessary to survive. Make it to round 20 to be rescued by the Genesis rebel group. 002 - CONTROLS
  • MOVEMENT - WASD
  • SHOOT - SPACE
  • UNLOCK ABILITY - R
  • ABILITIES
    • C4 
      • F - PLANT
      • G - DETONATE
    • PIERCING BULLETS - Q
    • MACHINE GUN - E
    • BLACK HOLE CANNON - V
003 - CREDITS

Art - Dario Quintero https://darottio.itch.io/

Programming - Austin Wu
